Question
========

A researcher randomly assigned three individuals to three groups each assigned and measured his outcome variable. The three group averages were 45, 48 and 54, respectively. He is going to analyze his results with analysis of variance. The squared sum between groups SS(Among) is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 42
* 63
* 84
* 126

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 42: Incorrect
* 63: Incorrect
* 84: Incorrect
* 126: Correct
